deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
A release schedule with a "halvening" event occuring every few periods.
 At some point, there are no more halvenings.
Gets the tokens scheduled to be distributed for a specific period.

A release schedule with a "halvening" event occuring every few periods.
 At some point, there are no more halvenings.
Gets the tokens scheduled to be distributed for a specific period.

params.firstPeriodDistribution_: Number of tokens to distribute in the first period.
params.halveningCyclePeriods_: Number of periods within each halvening cycle.
params.totalHalvenings_: Total number of halvenings until there are no more tokens to release.

getTokensForPeriod(uint256).notice: Gets the tokens scheduled to be distributed for a specific period.

userdoc.notice: A release schedule with a "halvening" event occuring every few periods. At some point, there are no more halvenings.
